locations.name: King's Landing
locations.description: A bustling capital where new adventurers gather.

locations.name: Whispering Woods
locations.description: A dense forest of half-heard rumors and hidden paths.

locations.name: Goblin Cave
locations.description: A cramped tunnel network crawling with opportunistic goblins.

locations.name: Ancient Library
locations.description: Ruins of a once-great archive, its stacks reclaimed by moss.

locations.name: Dragon Peak
locations.description: A jagged summit where the air tastes like lightning.
